entry.title: Trying it out GitHub Pages
entry.content:
I wanted to try GitHub pages out for a long time now, but somehow I never got to try it out.

Till now I think its pretty simple to set up and Jekyll’s GitHub page is also great, but I need to get used to markdown.
entry.summary: I wanted to try GitHub pages out for a long time now, but somehow I never got to try it out.
